SEARCH
Package system

Class MyFoodora

java.lang.Object
system.MyFoodora
public class MyFoodora extends Object
Singleton class representing the MyFoodora system, managing users, orders, profit strategies, and other key system functionalities. Contains all users, orders and profit data.
Author:
Alisson Bonatto

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser(String userType, String name, String lastName, String username, String adress, String password, String phoneNumber) throws BadUserCreationException
      Registers a user with full personal information.
      Parameters:
      userType - the type of user
      name - user's first name
      lastName - user's last name
      username - unique username
      adress - address of the user
      password - user's password
      phoneNumber - user's phone number
      Throws:
      BadUserCreationException - if user creation fails

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser(String userType, String name, String username, String adress, String password) throws BadUserCreationException
      Registers a user (alternative method with fewer arguments).
      Parameters:
      userType - the type of user
      name - user's name
      username - unique username
      adress - user's address
      password - user's password
      Throws:
      BadUserCreationException - if user creation fails

    • login

      public void login(String username, String password) throws UserNotFoundException, IncorrectCredentialsException
      Authenticates a user. The system saves the user logged in the system if authentication does not fails.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found
      IncorrectCredentialsException - if credentials are incorrect

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the currently logged-in user.

    • createDish

      public Dish createDish(String dishType, String name, double price, boolean isVegetarian, boolean isGlutenFree) throws BadNumberOfArgumentsException, BadDishTypeCreationException, BadArgumentTypeException
      Creates a new dish using the dish factory.
      Parameters:
      dishType - type of dish (Starter, MainDish, Dessert)
      name - name of the dish
      price - price of the dish
      isVegetarian - vegetarian flag
      isGlutenFree - gluten-free flag
      Returns:
      the created Dish
      Throws:
      BadNumberOfArgumentsException - if arguments are incorrect
      BadDishTypeCreationException - if the type is unrecognized
      BadArgumentTypeException - if argument types are invalid

    • createMeal

      public Meal createMeal(String mealType, String name, Set<Dish> dishes) throws UnrecognizedDishException, BadMealFormulaException, BadMealTypeCreationException, BadNumberOfArgumentsException, BadArgumentTypeException
      Creates a meal with default pricing strategy using the meal factory.
      Parameters:
      mealType - the type of meal
      name - name of the meal
      dishes - set of dishes
      Returns:
      the created Meal
      Throws:
      UnrecognizedDishException - if dish is unrecognized
      BadMealFormulaException - if meal formula is invalid
      BadMealTypeCreationException - if type is unrecognized
      BadNumberOfArgumentsException - if argument count is wrong
      BadArgumentTypeException - if argument types are invalid

    • createMeal

      public Meal createMeal(String mealType, String name, Set<Dish> dishes, PricingMealStrategy pricingStrategy) throws UnrecognizedDishException, BadMealFormulaException, BadMealTypeCreationException, BadNumberOfArgumentsException, BadArgumentTypeException
      Creates a meal with a custom pricing strategy using the meal factory.
      Parameters:
      mealType - the type of meal
      name - name of the meal
      dishes - set of dishes
      pricingStrategy - pricing strategy to apply
      Returns:
      the created Meal
      Throws:
      UnrecognizedDishException - if dish is unrecognized
      BadMealFormulaException - if meal formula is invalid
      BadMealTypeCreationException - if type is unrecognized
      BadNumberOfArgumentsException - if argument count is wrong
      BadArgumentTypeException - if argument types are invalid

    • selectCourier

      public ArrayList<Courier> selectCourier(Restaurant restaurantToPickDeliver, Customer customerToDeliver) throws AvailableCourierNotFoundException
      Selects a courier to deliver an order based on current delivery police.
      Parameters:
      restaurantToPickDeliver - the restaurant
      customerToDeliver - the customer
      Returns:
      the selected courier
      Throws:
      AvailableCourierNotFoundException - if no courier is available

    • sortDishesDeliveryFrequency

      public ArrayList<Dish> sortDishesDeliveryFrequency(Set<Dish> dishes)
      Returns a sorted list of dishes based on their delivery frequency.
      Parameters:
      dishes - set of dishes to sort
      Returns:
      sorted list of dishes

    • sortMealsDeliveryFrequency

      public ArrayList<Meal> sortMealsDeliveryFrequency(Set<Meal> meals)
      Returns a sorted list of meals based on their delivery frequency.
      Parameters:
      meals - set of meals to sort
      Returns:
      sorted list of meals

    • notifyUser

      public String notifyUser(Restaurant restaurant)
      Notifies the current user with the meal of the week, if they gave consent.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - the restaurant sending the notification
      Returns:
      string describing the meal or null if no consent or user

    • createOrder

      public Order createOrder(Restaurant restaurant, Customer customer)
      Creates a new order for the specified restaurant and customer. Initializes the order with no dishes or meals. The order is stored as the current order of the customer.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - the restaurant fulfilling the order
      customer - the customer placing the order

    • makeOrder

      public Order makeOrder(Order newOrder, HashSet<Dish> dishes, HashSet<Meal> meals) throws AvailableCourierNotFoundException
      Creates and processes a new order for the specified customer and restaurant, including the selected dishes and meals. A courier is automatically assigned based on the current delivery strategy. The order is only processed if the current user is an active customer and there is at least one dish or meal.
      Parameters:
      dishes - the set of individual dishes included in the order
      meals - the set of meals included in the order
      Throws:
      AvailableCourierNotFoundException - if no available courier can be assigned to the order

    • updateProfitDataFromTargetProfit

      public void updateProfitDataFromTargetProfit(double targetProfit)
      Updates the platform's profit data to meet a target profit over the last month.
      Parameters:
      targetProfit - the profit goal
